scripts.start: npm install && cd FE_P3 && npm install && cd ../BE_P3 && npm install && (npm run seed 2>/dev/null || npm run seed:dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'Running without seed...') && cd .. && npx npm-run-all --parallel "cd FE_P3 && npm run dev" "cd BE_P3 && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: npx npm-run-all --parallel "cd FE_P3 && npm run dev" "cd BE_P3 && npm run dev"
scripts.seed: cd BE_P3 && (npm run seed 2>/dev/null || npm run seed:dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'No seed script found')
